entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Toronto
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:11 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -13.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 04:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -13.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -18.6°C
Wind: N 22 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
